name: Redbrand Hideout (Under Tresendar Manor)
description: Secret hideout beneath the ruined Tresendar Manor. Cellars and crypts converted into gang headquarters with slave pens, workshops, barracks.
atmosphere: Damp underground. Mix of worked stone and natural caves. Western end lower than eastern. Redbrand thugs prowl corridors. Undead lurk in old crypts.

general_features.doors: Wood with iron, unlocked unless noted. DC 10 thieves tools or DC 20 Str to break
general_features.secret_doors: Blend with walls. Passive Perception 15 to spot, DC 10 Perception if searching

1_cellar.description: 5-ft landing 15 ft above large cellar. Stone steps down. Door under stairs. Stone cistern on west side. Kegs and barrels line walls.
1_cellar.secret: Waterproof satchel in cistern (DC 15 Perception or probing): potion healing, potion invisibility, 50 gp, travel clothes

2_barracks.description: Storeroom converted to barracks. 2 double bunks near door. Barrels and crates fill south half.
2_barracks.tactics: If hear noise in area 1, prepare ambush. If not warned, can be surprised via chimney from area 3.
2_barracks.treasure: Belt pouches: 16 sp + 7 gp, 12 sp + 5 gp, 15 ep + 2 garnets (10 gp each). 3 scarlet cloaks.

3_trapped_hall.description: Thick dust on flagstones. Faux columns every 10 ft. Copper-plated double doors at west end with angel relief.
3_trapped_hall.trap: Pit trap in middle (DC 15 Perception). False floor collapses under 100+ lbs. DC 15 Dex save or fall 20 ft for 2d6 damage. Can skirt on ledges with DC 10 Acrobatics.

4_tresendar_crypts.description: 3 stone sarcophagi. Skeletons in rusty mail propped against each. False columns carved as oak trees. Tarnished copper doors to SE.
4_tresendar_crypts.enemies: 3 skeletons (animate if approach area 5 or 6 doors without password 'Illefarn' or red cloak)
4_tresendar_crypts.treasure: Platinum signet ring in each sarcophagus (50 gp each)

5_slave_pens.description: Iron bars divide into 3 sections. Filthy straw in cells. Women in south cell, boy in north. Iron collars on prisoners. Pile of clothing against far wall.
5_slave_pens.prisoners: Mirna Dendrar, Nilsa (18), Nars (13) - kidnapped after Redbrands killed husband Thel
5_slave_pens.tactics: Guards wait by door to surprise intruders
5_slave_pens.doors: Chains and padlocks (DC 10 thieves tools or DC 22 Str)

6_armory.description: Weapon racks line walls: spears, swords, crossbows, bolts. Dozen dirty red cloaks hang by door.
6_armory.inventory: 12 spears, 6 shortswords, 4 longswords, 6 light crossbows, 8 quivers (20 bolts each)

7_storeroom.description: North end of natural cavern finished with stone blocks. Barrels, crates, packing materials. Cavern continues south with passages and deep pit/crevasse visible.
7_storeroom.treasure: 30 beaver pelts (2 gp each) - looted from Triboar Trail caravan

8_crevasse.description: Natural cavern with 10-20 ft deep crevasse dividing it. 2 wooden plank bridges (no rails) span chasm. Cold breeze, faint smell of decay.
features: Stream enters west, falls into crevasse, exits north
Ropes tied to stalagmites descend into crevasse
8_crevasse.enemies: 1 nothic (lurks in crevasse, uses Weird Insight)
8_crevasse.tactics: Nothic stalks party, attacks lone targets. Can negotiate - knows everything Redbrands know.
8_crevasse.trap: South bridge collapses if 50+ lbs. DC 15 Investigation to notice faulty construction.
8_crevasse.crevasse: 20 ft deep, rough walls (easy climb). Thel Dendrar's corpse at bottom.
8_crevasse.treasure: Chest in cubbyhole under north bridge: 160 sp, 120 gp, 5 malachite (15 gp each), 2 potions healing, scroll augury, +1 longsword 'Talon' with bird-of-prey hilt
8_crevasse.magic: Crevasse has faint necromantic aura - organic matter ages/decomposes at half rate

9_guard_barracks.description: 4 wooden bunks. Heaps of blankets, dirty dishes. Strong smell of unwashed bodies and rotten meat. Loud gruff voices in Goblin.
9_guard_barracks.tactics: Bugbears bully Droop. Goblin faints when party appears. If wearing red cloaks, bugbears assume party serves Iarno.
9_guard_barracks.roleplaying: Droop is coward, helpful if rescued. Knows hideout layout, Cragmaw patrol routes.
9_guard_barracks.treasure: Mosk (leader) has 33 sp, jeweled eye patch (50 gp), iron key (unlocks all doors)

10_common_room.description: Steep escarpments divide into 3 levels. Carved stairs to ledges. 2 large tables in middle with braziers. Smaller table on east ledge. Skeletal warriors everywhere.
10_common_room.enemies: 7 ghouls (on west ledge, hidden in shadows)
10_common_room.tactics: Ghouls smell/hear activity, bound down to attack

11_wizards_workshop.description: Alembics, retorts, distillation equipment bubbling away. Bookshelves with parchment and tomes. Rat scurries under worktable.
features: Alchemy setup for brewing potions of invisibility (not successful yet)
11_wizards_workshop.rat: Shares telepathic bond with Iarno in area 12. Sends warning when detects intruders. AC 10, 1 hp, speed 20.
11_wizards_workshop.books: Dwarvish journal of Urmon describing Lost Mine history, Forge of Spells, mace Lightbringer
11_wizards_workshop.treasure: 3 bottles rare reagents: mercury, dragon bile, powdered nightshade (25 gp each)

12_glasstaff_quarters.description: Scarlet drapes on walls. Writing desk with chair, bed, wooden chest at foot of bed.
12_glasstaff_quarters.escape: If rat warns him, Iarno grabs staff + scrolls, flees through NE secret door to area 7, then area 8, then area 1 cistern for emergency kit, uses invisibility potion to escape.
12_glasstaff_quarters.letter: From Black Spider ordering capture/kill of strangers, delivery of dwarven maps
12_glasstaff_quarters.treasure: Chest (unlocked): 180 sp, 130 gp, silk pouch with 5 carnelians (10 gp), 2 peridots (15 gp), 1 pearl (100 gp), scroll charm person, scroll fireball

key_info.secret_entrance: Carp Alderleaf knows tunnel through thicket to area 8
key_info.main_entrance: Through Tresendar Manor cellar to area 1
key_info.boss: Iarno Albrek = Glasstaff, traitor to Lords Alliance
key_info.connection: Works for Black Spider, controls Phandalin for him

advancement: Should be level 3 after clearing hideout
